HTB Cyber Apocalypse CTF - 21/03/2023

HacktheBox CTF - Cyber Apocalypse

HTB Cyber Apocalypse CTF

I came accross a new CTF on ctftime.org today and decided to give it a try for fun.

The CTF is called Cyber Apocalypse: The Cursed Mission and is being hosted by HackTheBox organization. It’s an online CTF competition with a format called ‘Jeopardy’ where you need to solve 74 challenges out of 10 different categories. Prize pool is 35K USD.

Currently there seems to be 6K+ teams registered with a total of 11K+ players.

I’ll share my write-ups here if i can solve any challenges :)

Wish me luck !
